text: Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pan ndi fi tɨv khare. Fhe Bakɨme Isreriŋ rɨgar guma bavira ndi fagim, ana ŋaar khare, Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ mbuav, ana kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme muunga bigi, ana mbe nzuav mben kurkurav mba ŋaara mbui. Ana mbarkɨrga bigi, mbe fhura ntan Fhe Bakɨme ndɨɨv, mbe Fhe Bakɨme, mbe muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨr zav, mbe ana nzuav mbui ofari, ana mben han nta ndiav, Fhe Bakɨme ndɨɨi.
